verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֥חַ <WH5329> lam-natz-Tze-acho the chief Musician עַֽל־ <WH5921> [T'al-upon מָחֲלַ֗ת <WH4257> ma-cha-Lat, upon Mahalath מַשְׂכִּ֥יל <WH4905> mas-Kil Maschil לְדָוִֽד׃ <WH1732> le-da-Vid. [A Psalm] of David אָ֘מַ֤ר <WH559> 'a-Mar hath said נָבָ֣ל <WH5036> na-Val The fool בְּ֭לִבּוֹ <WH3820> be-lib-bo in his heart אֵ֣ין <WH369> 'ein There אֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> E-lo-Him; [There is] no God הִֽ֝שְׁחִ֗יתוּ <WH7843> hish-Chi-tu, Corrupt וְהִֽתְעִ֥יבוּ <WH8581> ve-hit-'I-vu are they and have done abominable עָ֝֗וֶל <WH5766> 'A-vel, iniquity אֵ֣ין <WH369> 'ein is no עֹֽשֵׂה־ <WH6213> 'o-seh- [there is] none that doeth טֽוֹב׃ <WH2896> Tov. good

אֱ‍ ֽלֹהִ֗ים <WH430> 'elo-Him, God מִשָּׁמַיִם֮ <WH8064> mish-sha-ma-Yim from heaven הִשְׁקִ֪יף <WH8259> hish-Kif looked down עַֽל־ <WH5921> 'al- upon בְּנֵ֫י <WH1121> be-Nei upon the children אָדָ֥ם <WH120> 'a-Dam of men לִ֭רְאוֹת <WH7200> Lir-'ot to see הֲיֵ֣שׁ <WH3426> ha-Yesh if there were מַשְׂכִּ֑יל <WH7919> mas-Kil; [any] that did understand דֹּ֝רֵ֗שׁ <WH1875> do-Resh, that did seek אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> E-lo-Him. God

כֻּלּ֥וֹ <WH3605> kul-Lo Every סָג֮ <WH5472> sag Every one of them is gone back יַחְדָּ֪ו <WH3162> yach-Dav they are altogether נֶ֫אֱלָ֥חוּ <WH444> ne-'e-La-chu become filthy אֵ֤ין <WH369> 'ein There עֹֽשֵׂה־ <WH6213> 'o-seh- [there is] none that doeth ט֑וֹב <WH2896> Tov; good אֵ֝֗ין <WH369> 'Ein, is no גַּם־ <WH1571> gam- even אֶחָֽד׃ <WH259> 'e-Chad. no not one

הֲלֹ֥א <WH3808> ha-Lo no יָדְעוּ֮ <WH3045> ya-de-'U no knowledge פֹּ֤עֲלֵ֫י <WH6466> po-'a-Lei Have the workers אָ֥וֶן <WH205> 'A-ven of iniquity אֹכְלֵ֣י <WH398> 'o-che-Lei ;who eat up עַ֭מִּי <WH5971> 'Am-mi my people אָ֣כְלוּ <WH398> 'A-che-lu [as] they eat לֶ֑חֶם <WH3899> Le-chem; bread אֱ֝לֹהִ֗ים <WH430> E-lo-Him, upon God לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo no קָרָֽאוּ׃ <WH7121> ka-Ra-'u. they have not called

שָׁ֤ם׀ <WH8033> sham There פָּֽחֲדוּ־ <WH6342> pa-cha-du- fear פַחַד֮ <WH6343> fa-Chad There were they in great לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- no הָ֪יָה֫ <WH1961> ha-yah had been פָ֥חַד <WH6343> Fa-chad [where] no fear כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- because אֱלֹהִ֗ים <WH430> E-lo-Him, was for God פִּ֭זַּר <WH6340> Piz-zar hath scattered עַצְמ֣וֹת <WH6106> atz-Mot the bones חֹנָ֑ךְ <WH2583> cho-Nach; of him that encampeth הֱ֝בִשֹׁ֗תָה <WH954> he-vi-Sho-tah, [against] thee thou hast put [them] to shame כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- because אֱלֹהִ֥ים <WH430> E-lo-Him because God מְאָסָֽם׃ <WH3988> me-'a-Sam. hath despised

מִ֥י <WH4310> mi Oh יִתֵּ֣ן <WH5414> yit-Ten Oh that מִצִּיּוֹן֮ <WH6726> mitz-tzi-yOn [were come] out of Zion יְשֻׁע֪וֹת <WH3444> ye-shu-'ot the salvation יִשְׂרָ֫אֵ֥ל <WH3478> yis-Ra-'El of Israel בְּשׁ֣וּב <WH7725> be-Shuv bringeth back אֱ֭לֹהִים <WH430> E-lo-Him When God שְׁב֣וּת <WH7622> she-Vut the captivity עַמּ֑וֹ <WH5971> am-Mo; of his people יָגֵ֥ל <WH1523> ya-Gel shall rejoice יַ֝עֲקֹ֗ב <WH3290> ya-'a-Ko, Jacob יִשְׂמַ֥ח <WH8055> yis-Mach shall be glad יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El. [and] Israel
